Steps.StepString: Attempted to log in with a non-existent username and password
Log in was successful, indicating the application is vulnerable to authentication bypass
Crafted a payload to access protected resources without valid username and password credentials
Payload included a request to the resource with a crafted cookie containing a valid user's username and password
Was able to bypass authentication and access the protected resources
Demonstrated potential risks associated with authentication bypass attacks
Recommended proper countermeasures to prevent such attacks
